attributes.action: insist that Dragonforce represent the UK at next years Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dragonforce are the UK's leading producer of Power Metal, and would produce a clean sweep at Eurovision if they were just given a chance.  

This is now an issue of national pride.

This petition is not mean't to be humourous (okay, a bit).

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
